changeSet.sql: create sequence investment_seq; create table if not exists investment ( id bigint not null constraint investment_pkey primary key, invested_amount numeric(19,2), auth_id bigint constraint investment_fk_on_auth references auth, campaign_id bigint constraint investment_fk_on_campaign references campaign, investment_state_id bigint constraint investment_fk_on_investment_state references investment_state, request_state_id bigint constraint investment_fk_on_request_state references request_state, creation_date timestamp NOT NULL, payment_date timestamp );
